Do not respond with additional text such as \"Here is the plain text version of the provided markdown content\": "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"markdownText"},{"type":"literal","text":" "}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"markdownText","text":"markdownText","type":"text","quickTestValue":"When traveling to Russia, it's important to be aware of the cultural etiquette to ensure respectful and smooth interactions:\\n\\n**Greetings:**\\n- Handshakes are common, but a firm handshake with direct eye contact is preferred.\\n- Men usually shake hands with other men, but it is less common for men to shake hands with women.\\n\\n**Dress Code:**\\n- Dress conservatively, especially in religious places and formal settings.\\n- Business attire is typically formal, with suits and ties for men and equivalent professional attire for women.\\n\\n**Communication:**\\n- Russians value direct communication and may come across as blunt.\\n- Avoid discussing sensitive political topics, especially those related to the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine [1].\\n\\n**Dining Etiquette:**\\n- Wait for the host to start eating before you begin.\\n- It is polite to leave a small amount of food on your plate to show that you are satisfied.\\n\\n**Social Etiquette:**\\n- Respect local laws and customs, as arbitrary enforcement can occur [1].\\n- Be aware that dual U.S.-Russian citizens may face specific challenges, including forced military service and restrictions on leaving the country [2].\\n\\n**Travel Considerations:**\\n- Be cautious of the risk of harassment or wrongful detention by Russian security officials [1].\\n\\nThese guidelines will help you navigate social interactions and respect cultural norms while in Russia.\\n\\n[1]: https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/international-travel/International-Travel-Country-Information-Pages/RussianFederation.html/ \\\"Russia International Travel Information\\\"\\n[2]: https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/traveladvisories/russia-travel-advisory.html?response_type=embed \\\"Russia Travel Advisory\\\""}],"formulas":[],"data":[],"output":{"formats":["text"]}},"modelParameters":{"modelType":"default","gptParameters":{"temperature":0}},"settings":{"recordRetrievalLimit":30,"shouldPreserveRecordLinks":null,"runtime":null}}
